meanings.definition: A person or thing that fetches.
meanings.sent1: My little brother is one of the fetchers in our family, always getting things for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The robot in the movie was a helpful fetcher, bringing tools to the astronauts.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel became an unexpected fetcher when it started collecting acorns for the birds.
meanings.sent4: The sun, like a diligent fetcher, brings light and warmth to the earth every day.
meanings.sent5: The ant colony worked together like a team of fetchers, gathering food for the winter.

meanings.definition: A dog trained to retrieve game.
meanings.sent1: The golden retriever was a skilled fetcher, bringing back the ball every time.
meanings.sent2: Hunters rely on their fetchers to retrieve ducks and other game during hunting.
meanings.sent3: The fetcher dog surprised everyone by retrieving a lost hat from the pond.
meanings.sent4: The fetcher dog's determination was like a superhero, always ready to retrieve any object.
meanings.sent5: The fetcher dog's wagging tail showed its excitement to retrieve the thrown stick.
